about_the_game:
Argentum Online: An Epic 2D MMORPG Adventure

Argentum Online is a captivating 2D MMORPG that transports players to a vast, open-world fantasy realm filled with endless possibilities. With its roots firmly planted in the traditions of classic online role-playing games, Argentum Online stands out by offering a richly detailed universe designed for both the solo adventurer and teams of allies.

Main Features:
- Epic Quests and Adventures: Embark on hundreds of quests, each telling a piece of the world's vast lore and history. From saving villages from marauding monsters to uncovering ancient secrets, there's always a new challenge.
- Dungeon Delving: Explore deep, treacherous dungeons full of fierce creatures and valuable loot. Team up with friends or brave these dangers solo.
- PvP Combat: Engage in intense player vs. player combat. Fight for honor, glory, or just the thrill of battle in various PvP formats.
- Community and Economy: Join a community where your actions impact the world. Trade, negotiate, and compete in a player-driven economy that adds a layer of strategy to the game.
- Customization: Create and customize your character with a variety of skills, attributes, and gear. Tailor your hero to your playstyle, whether you're a front-line warrior or a cunning mage.
- Open-World Exploration: Discover a world teeming with life, from bustling cities to remote wilderness. Experience dynamic events and uncover hidden treasures and secrets.

Argentum Online offers a blend of nostalgia for MMORPG veterans and accessibility for newcomers. With its emphasis on community, exploration, and player-driven content, it's a game where every player can carve out their own legacy. Join now and become part of the legend!

Dive into Argentum Online and start your adventure today!

name: Argentum Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“Argentum Online is an underground and anarchic game. It has no owner; it's the game of the people.”
10 – Pagina 12

“The role-playing game from La Plata that gains followers via the Internet”
9 – El Dia

“Argentum, the massive Argentine role-playing game from 1999, returns with a renewed version.”
10 – La Nacion
short_description: Argentum Online, a 2D MMORPG, offers epic quests, dungeon delves, and battles in a fantasy world. Emphasizing community, it features alliances, PvP, and a player-driven economy, all within a vibrant open-world setting.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, English
*languages with full audio support
